alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 7:35PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Chicot, northeastern Ashley, Washington and southern Bolivar Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 735 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Dermott, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dermott around 740 PM CDT. Mcmillan Corner around 750 PM CDT. Winterville and Lamont around 805 PM CDT. Greenville and Metcalfe around 810 PM CDT. Leland around 815 PM CDT. Tribbett around 820 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...and northwestern Mississippi.
